item.title: 美国大幅加征关税前数月中国经济可能增长 5.2
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁到中国 5%左右的经济增长目标之前，如果没有更多的刺激措施，中国很可能会在 2025 年初报告稳健的经济增长。【原文：China will likely report solid economic growth for the start of 2025, a period before Donald Trump’s tariffs threaten its around 5% growth target without more stimulus.】

item.title: 专注非洲的 DPI 接管 Nclude，进军风险投资领域
item.description: 以非洲为重点的国际发展伙伴组织正在接管埃及的一家风险投资基金，以扩大对早期公司的投资。【原文：Africa-focused Development Partners International is taking over a venture capital fund in Egypt to expand into investing in early-stage companies.】

item.title: 贸易问题引发更多忧虑，美国期货下跌：市场综述
item.description: 白宫计划对半导体和药品进口征收关税，推动美国期货下跌，亚洲股市开盘谨慎。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a cautious opening after White House plans to impose tariffs on semiconductor and pharmaceutical imports pushed US futures down.】

item.title: 关注关税举措和美伊谈判，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 石油在周一不温不火的交易时段后持稳，交易员们在关注美国在贸易战中的最新举措，以及对伊朗原油限制放宽的前景。【原文：Oil was steady after a tepid session on Monday, with traders monitoring the latest US moves in the trade war and the prospect of looser restrictions on Iranian crude.】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的 RSA Security 与债权人终止债务谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group 支持的 RSA Security 公司与其一组贷款人之间的秘密谈判因无法达成债务重组条款而破裂。【原文：Confidential talks between Clearlake Capital Group-backed RSA Security and a group of its lenders have fallen apart after terms on a debt restructuring couldn’t be reached, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 贝森特表示 "一切都在考虑之中"，向最富有者征税
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，共和党人正在研究所有方案，以帮助支付唐纳德-特朗普总统的减税竞选承诺，包括增加对最富有美国人的征税。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Republicans are looking at all options to help pay for President Donald Trump’s campaign promises on tax cuts, including increasing levies on the wealthiest Americans.】

item.title: 银湖为 Altera 交易安排 20 亿美元债务融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）从英特尔公司收购可编程芯片公司 Altera 51% 的股份时，一批银行将为其提供 20 亿美元的债务。【原文：A group of banks is providing Silver Lake Management $2 billion in debt for its acquisition of a 51% stake in programmable chips unit Altera from Intel Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 康登特称黑客外泄 "有限 "客户文件
item.description: 业务流程服务公司 Conduent Inc. 说，一名黑客 "有限地 "进入了该公司的部分系统，并窃取了一些客户的文件。【原文：Conduent Inc., a business processes service, said a hacker gained access to a “limited” portion of the company’s systems and stole files for some clients.】

item.title: 应用材料公司收购芯片齿轮合作伙伴 Besi 公司 9% 的股份
item.description: 美国最大的芯片制造设备生产商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest US producer of chipmaking machinery, disclosed a 9% stake in BE Semiconductor Industries NV, its partner on a project with AI computing applications.】

item.title: 贝森特称财政部拥有庞大的工具箱，可满足债券市场的需要
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）淡化了近期债券市场的大跌，拒绝接受外国抛售所持美国国债的猜测，同时表示财政部拥有在必要时应对失调的工具。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent played down the recent selloff in the bond market, rejecting speculation that foreign nations were dumping their holdings of US Treasuries, while flagging that his department has tools to address dislocation if needed.】

item.title: 铜贸易商和制造商讨论智利冶炼厂的资金问题
item.description: 智利的 Enami 公司正在与有意为一个价值 14 亿多美元的冶炼项目融资的制造商和贸易公司进行谈判，因为这个顶级铜矿开采国希望阻止加工能力的下降。【原文：Chile’s Enami is in talks with manufacturers and trading firms interested in financing a $1.4 billion-plus smelting project as the top copper-mining nation looks to arrest a drop in processing capacity.】

item.title: 贝森特预计阿根廷有能力偿还中国掉期贷款
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，尽管美国政府不考虑向阿根廷提供任何直接信贷，但他预计阿根廷将有能力偿还与中国的掉期贷款。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he expects Argentina to be able to pay off its swap line with China, even though the US government isn’t considering providing the crisis-prone nation with any direct credit of its own.】

item.title: 安森美半导体撤回69亿美元收购Allegro的出价
item.description: 安森美半导体公司放弃了收购Allegro MicroSystems公司的努力，撤回了每股35.10美元的出价。【原文：ON Semiconductor Corp. scrapped efforts to acquire Allegro MicroSystems Inc., withdrawing a bid of $35.10 a share.】

item.title: 债券市场反弹缓解了受贸易战动荡影响的市场情绪
item.description: 自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动全球贸易战以来，市场经历了大幅下挫和异常剧烈的波动，华尔街周一终于得以喘息。【原文：Wall Street on Monday finally caught a respite from the deep selloffs and unusually sharp swings that have raced through markets ever since President Donald Trump unleashed his global trade war.】

item.title: 巴西将提供巴西国家石油公司争相钻探的石油区块
item.description: 巴西石油监管机构将授予国家控制的石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）在一个前景广阔的近海地区的勘探权。【原文：Brazil’s oil regulator is set to grant exploration rights in a promising offshore region where state-controlled oil producer Petrobras has faced a years-long dispute with environmental authorities to start drilling.】

item.title: 赫兹称黑客窃取了驾驶执照号码和个人数据
item.description: 赫兹公司供应链遭到黑客攻击，目前正提醒客户注意涉及驾驶执照号码和其他个人信息的数据泄露事件。【原文：Hertz is alerting customers to a data breach involving driver’s license numbers and other personal information, following a hack in its supply chain.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省养老金在关税战中停止赴美非必要旅行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对加拿大发动贸易战之际，阿尔伯塔投资管理公司（Alberta Investment Management Corp.【原文：Alberta Investment Management Corp. has asked its employees to stop non-essential business trips to the US amid President Donald Trump’s trade war against Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 买入加拿大 "扩展至股票 ETF，创 2021 年以来最大流量
item.description: 上周，投资者以四年来从未有过的速度向专注于加拿大股票的交易所交易基金投入资金。【原文：Investors poured money into exchange-traded funds focused on Canadian equities last week at a rate not seen in four years.】

item.title: 苹果将分析设备上的用户数据以加强人工智能技术
item.description: 苹果公司将开始分析客户设备上的数据，以改进其人工智能平台，此举旨在保护用户信息，同时帮助其赶上人工智能竞争对手。【原文：Apple Inc. will begin analyzing data on customers’ devices in a bid to improve its artificial intelligence platform, a move designed to safeguard user information while still helping it catch up with AI rivals.】

item.title: 摩根大通囤积现金者在债券市场混乱中出手
item.description: 摩根资产管理公司（J.P. Morgan Asset Management）的债券投资组合经理比尔-艾根（Bill Eigen）过去三年来一直囤积现金，随着信贷市场出现裂痕，他终于开始至少部署其中的一部分资金。【原文：Bill Eigen, a bond portfolio manager at J.P. Morgan Asset Management who’s been hoarding cash for the past three years, has finally started deploying at least some of those funds as the credit market shows signs of cracks.】

item.title: 关税引发的市场动荡使芝加哥养老金损失 10 亿美元
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策引发的市场崩溃中，芝加哥的四个养老基金估计损失了近 10 亿美元，这对该市的退休计划是一个打击，而该市的退休计划是美国所有大城市中资金最少的。【原文：Four Chicago pension funds are estimated to have lost nearly $1 billion amid the market rout set off by President Donald Trump’s tariff policies, a blow to the city’s retirement programs that are among the least funded of all major US cities.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "获得在莱索托运营的许可
item.description: 莱索托向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司颁发了在这个南部非洲山区小国运营卫星网络的许可证。【原文：Lesotho granted a license to Elon Musk’s Starlink to operate its satellite network in the tiny southern African mountain kingdom.】

item.title: 关税有可能提高建筑成本和公共汽车买家的要求
item.description: Van Eck Associates Corp. 的塔玛拉-洛温（Tamara Lowin）表示，关税将使州和地方政府的建设计划复杂化，投资者将寻求更多补偿，以应对不确定性。【原文：Tariffs are going to complicate state and local governments’ construction plans, and investors will be looking for more compensation to account for the uncertainty, according to Tamara Lowin of Van Eck Associates Corp.】

item.title: Webull 在 SPAC 合并后的第二个交易日股价大涨 441
item.description: Webull Corp. 上周与一家空头支票公司合并上市后，周一股价上涨了五倍多。【原文：Webull Corp. shares more than quintupled on Monday after the online brokerage went public last week by merging with a blank-check vehicle.】

item.description: 帕姆-杜西（Pam Duthie）是一位 51 岁的英国手工艺人，她的生意主要是向美国人出售一种独特的方式，以记录他们对毛茸茸朋友的爱。【原文：Pam Duthie, a 51-year-old UK-based artisan, built her business selling Americans a unique way to capture their love of their furry friends.】

item.title: 白桥考虑出售补充剂制造商 Named Group
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利私募股权公司 White Bridge Investments 正在探索出售食品补充剂公司 Named Group，该公司的估值可能高达 8 亿欧元（约合 9.07 亿美元）。【原文：Italian private equity firm White Bridge Investments is exploring a sale of food-supplements firm Named Group, which could be valued at as much as €800 million ($907 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比索下跌 12%，米莱告诉阿根廷农民立即出售大豆
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统鼓励阿根廷潘帕斯地区的农民抓住周一的时机，在放松货币管制后立即出售大豆，这使得比索在官方市场上贬值了约 12%。【原文：President Javier Milei encouraged farmers on Argentina’s Pampas to seize the moment Monday and sell their soybeans now after he eased currency controls, which weakened the peso by about 12% on official markets.】

item.title: 旗舰基金股价暴跌，Armistice 三月亏损 19
item.description: Armistice Capital 上个月亏损了近 19%，这是该对冲基金旗舰资金池自十多年前推出以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Armistice Capital lost almost 19% last month, the biggest decline for the hedge fund’s flagship money pool since its launch more than a decade ago.】
